scripts.setup: npm install --prefix Bot-Verifica && npm install --prefix Bot-Benvenuto && npm install --prefix Bot-Arrivederci && npm install --prefix Bot-Regolamento && npm install --prefix Bot-Tickets
scripts.start: npm run setup && concurrently "node Bot-Verifica/index.js" "node Bot-Benvenuto/index.js" "node Bot-Arrivederci/index.js" "node Bot-Regolamento/index.js" "node Bot-Tickets/index.js"
